questions.question: What are the four values represented in the text-shadow property?
options: A) Horizontal offset, vertical offset, blur radius, color
questions.explanation: According to the text, the text-shadow property has four specific values: horizontal offset (left/right), vertical offset (up/down), blur radius (sharpness of shadow), and color of the shadow.

questions.question: In CSS animations, what does the 'alternate' value for animation-direction property do?
options: A) Plays the animation only forward
B) Plays the animation only in reverse
C) Plays the animation forwards first, then backwards
questions.explanation: The text explicitly states that when using the 'alternate' value, the animation is played forwards first, then backwards, creating an alternating pattern.
